value.title: Condición inicial aplicada
value.description:
Transtextualize this mathematical equation into Spanish, 
 explicating each part with the utmost clarity and comprehensibility: 
y(0) = -1

For example:
- y = x + 2 transcends into "the derivative of y with respect to x is equal to x plus two"
- y(x) = C1*e^x translates to "y of x is equal to C1 times e elevated to x"

My response:
Marque esta ecuación matemática es en texto en español:
- La condición es que 'y(0)' es '-1'. 

En la ecuación, la cual es
